title: Mets' Daniel Murphy called out for being anti-gay 'bigot' during incredible postseason run
text:
Back in March, Mets second baseman and devout Christian Daniel Murphy caused an uproar when he made these comments to NJ Advance Media about MLB's inclusion ambassador Billy Bean, who announced he was gay after his playing days ad who visited the team during spring training:
"I disagree with his lifestyle. I do disagree with the fact that Billy is a homosexual. That doesn't mean I can't still invest in him and get to know him. I don't think the fact that someone is a homosexual should completely shut the door on investing in them in a relational aspect. Getting to know him. That, I would say, you can still accept them but I do disagree with the lifestyle, 100 percent."
PLUS: Murphy is the reason these Cubs still look cursed | Politi
